channel.title: Learn what to build with Okta API use cases :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Okta API scenarios and use cases Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Completely new doc with new content Target personas: Internal application builders, Saas Builder Description: This document links out to all docs that detail solutions, use cases, and scenarios that use that use the Okta APIs including apps that access the system log, apps that send risk signals to Okta, and app that syncs user profiles, etc
